About

I’m currently in my first year at the University of Portsmouth studying computer science where I’m learning new tech and continuing to advance my existing skills.

In my spare time I’m continuing to develop my main project ManyTwitch, while also creating new pens on my Codepen weekly. The source code for all my projects can be found on GitHub, you can also connect with me on LinkedIn.

You can contact me at daniel_hearn@outlook.com.
